answers.answer: Just wondering how did you find out you had it? Did you have any symptoms that made you get it checked out? I have very slight swelling one ankle but I think it's a bug bite bc there is a red spot. And absolutely no pain or swelling any where else. I'm paranoid though lol

I have very high protein in my urine and too much swelling in my face, feet, and hands. My b/p is fine but it has to do with the urine also. My doctor has been seeing me every week now for the past 6 weeks
I'm sure you're baby will be very healthy! Keep your spirits up :) so happy for you, you'll have your little babe soon!

They have tested me throughout my pregnancy for that..I did the 24 he urine ..it came back fine but I started having to go once a week now for NST (non stress test) until I have baby..they r Concern cus I had high blood pressure before I got pregnant but haven't since I've been pregnant....I'm so ready for baby to come.
This pregnancy has been so difficult compared to my first 10 years ago. Thank you guys for ur support I just wanna meet my Lil guy!

question: I have preeclampsia and my doctor has been having me collect my urine for 4 weeks already. Today I was told next week we will find out the date I will be having the baby earlier! I'm so nervous and excited to meet my baby. I just want to make sure he's healthy.
title: preeclampsia- 34 weeks
